sen.j: 紀秋峰（きのあきみね、生没年不詳）は、平安時代前期の歌人。
sen.e: KI no Akimine (date of birth and death unknown) was a poet of the early Heian period.
KI no Akimine (date of birth and death unknown) was a poet of the early Heian period.
KI no Akimine (year of birth and death unknown) was a poet of the early Heian period.
sen.cmt: 不要なスペースを削除しました。生没年不詳 year of birth and death unknown 用語統一リストより訂正しました。

sen.j: 大納言紀古佐美の曾孫。
sen.e: Great grandchild of Dainagon (chief councilor of state) KI no Kosami.
Great grandchild of Dainagon (chief councilor of state) KI no Kosami.
Great grandchild of Dainagon (chief councilor of state) KI no Kosami.
His father was KI no Yoshimine, Governor of Mino Province.
His father was KI no Yoshimine, Governor of Mino Province.
His father was KI no Yoshimine, Governor of Mino Province.

sen.j: 兄に能吏として名高い紀夏井がいる。
sen.e: His elder brother KI no Natsui was a capable official held in high esteem.
His elder brother KI no Natsui was a capable official held in high esteem.
His elder brother KI no Natsui was a capable official held in high esteem.

sen.j: 寛平年間（889年-898年）に催された皇太夫人班子女王歌合などの歌合に出詠。
sen.e: Between 889 and 898 produced poetry anthologies for poetry soirees held by the Dowager Empress.
Between 889 and 898 produced poetry anthologies for poetry soirees held by the Dowager Empress.
Between 889 and 898 produced poetry anthologies for poetry soirees held by the Dowager Empress.
sen.cmt: 不要なスペースを削除しました。

sen.j: 勅撰和歌集では『古今和歌集』に2首入集している（歌番号158・324）。
sen.e: In imperial compilations of poetry, 2 of his poems are included in "Kokin Wakashu" (A Collection of Ancient and Modern Japanese Poetry) (poems # 158 and 324).
In imperial compilations of poetry, 2 of his poems are included in "Kokin Wakashu" (A Collection of Ancient and Modern Japanese Poetry) (poems # 158 and 324).
In imperial compilations of poetry, 2 of his poems are included in "Kokin Wakashu" (A Collection of Ancient and Modern Japanese Poetry) (poems No. 158 and 324).
sen.cmt: 全角の”を半角にしました。記号をNo. と訂正しました。
